title: The Generational Blessing | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: The Generational Blessing | Joel Osteen
description:
The decisions we make don't just affect us; they affect the generations that will come after us. Every time you choose to do the right thing, you're sowing a legacy of blessing for your family. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
